Performance:
February 1981: The Love Suicides at Amijima

Production: February 1981

Play: The Love Suicides at Amijima (心中天網島)

– Click image to view.

Scenes:

The Tea House Kawasho (北新地河庄 / Kitanoshinchi Kawashō)

Jihei's House (天満紙屋内 / Tenma kamiya uchi)

The Yamatoya Tea House (大和屋 / Yamatoya)

Characters:

Jihei (Kamiya Jihei / 紙屋治兵衛)

Magoemon (Koya Magoemon / 粉屋孫右衛門)

Koharu (Kinokuniya Koharu / 紀の国屋小春)

Otama (Gejo Otama / 下女お玉)

Tahei (Edoya Tahei / 江戸屋太兵衛)

Zenroku (Gokanya Zenroku / 五貫屋善六)

Kawasho proprietor (Kawashō teishu / 河庄亭主)

Night watchman (Yomawari / 夜回り )

Maid servant (Kinokuniya Shimo onago / 紀の国屋下女子(下女))

Osan (Nyōbō Osan / 女房おさん)

Gozaemon (Shūto Gozaemon / 舅五左衛門)

Sangoro (Decchi Sangorō / 丁稚三五郎)

Kantaro (Segare Kantarō / 伜勘太郎)

Osue (Musume Osue / 娘お末)

Osan's mother (Osan no haha / おさんの母)

Brothel supervisor (Kasha / 花車)

Courtesan (Hōbai jorō / 傍輩女郎)

Dembei (Yamatoya Denbei / 大和屋伝兵衛)

Denkai (Denkaibō / 伝界坊)

Saibei (Kinokuniya Saibei / 紀の国屋才兵衛)
